name: TKC Kitchen Premium Pizza Cutter - Durable Stainless Steel Pizza Cutter Wheel - Easy-to-Clean, Easy-to-Use Pizza Slicer - Super Sharp with Non-Slip Handle - Dishwasher Safe Pizza Wheel (Red)
short_description: EFFORTLESS PIZZA SLICES: Triangle, rectangle, or square, slice your pizza through toppings and cheese with this pizza cutter. From thin or thick crusts to deep dish pies, the sharp blades and one-piece design give you those clean cuts every time without any wobbling. This 4-inch diameter slicer is a must-have kitchen gadget if you are a pizza lover. HIGH-QUALITY AND ERGONOMIC DESIGN: This pizza slicer is made of premium, rust-resistant stainless steel, making it durable and long-lasting. It is also designed with a built-in protective guard to place the finger when slicing a pizza; the non-slip, curved handle provides comfortable use. MULTIPURPOSE SLICER: Not only for slicing a pizza, this pizza cutter wheel can be used for other food items. It is perfect for slicing through pie dough, cheese, fresh herbs, homemade pasta, bread, cookie dough, and waffles. EASY TO CLEAN AND STORE: Cleaning this pizza slicer cutter is as simple as slicing a pizza for yourself. Run it under water with soap or place it in the top rack of a dishwasher. For longevity, ensure the professional pizza cutter is completely dry before storing. It is built with a hanging hole for convenient storage. HASSLE-FREE, TKC GUARANTEE: We love and take pride in our stainless steel pizza cutter and back it with lifetime warranty. If there are any issues, just contact us, and we will make it right. No more settling for uneven slices!
product_description: TKC Kitchen Premium Pizza Cutter - Durable Stainless Steel Pizza Cutter Wheel - Easy-to-Clean, Easy-to-Use Pizza Slicer - Super Sharp with Non-Slip Handle - Dishwasher Safe Pizza Wheel (Red)

name: Cuisinart CPS-006 Pizza Wheel Cutter
short_description: 4 IN. CUTTING BLADE: Easily slices through pizzas in one motion for quick cutting. EASY CLEANING: The handle, blade and blade cover all come apart and are top-rack dishwasher safe, making sure no food bits are stuck and left behind. ROTATING BLADE GUARD: Safety feature that keeps you protected from the blade when it is stored away and also protects the blade from any scratches. SOFT, TEXTURED HANDLE: Offers a comfortable and non-slip grip.
product_description: Replace your old pizza cutter with the sharp and stylish Cuisinart Pizza Cutter Wheel! The 4” cutting blade easily slices through pizzas, while the soft, textured rubber grip fits comfortably in the palm of your hand. The cutter features a rotating blade guard that keeps the blade contained when put away for storage and protects the blade from scratches. For easy clean up, the handle, blade and blade guard all come apart and are top-rack dishwasher safe, making sure no food bits are stuck and left behind.

short_description: SLICE PIZZA LIKE A PRO: Crucial tool, Stainless steel pizza cutter, Pizza restaurants use a roller cutter like this one.
